summary: When a small Utah-based edited movie company is caught sanitizing Hollywood's copyrighted material, the film industry strikes back with a devastating blow.
cast: Ray Lines|Allan Erb|Scott Nybo|Danny Thompson|Robert Perry|David Knowlton|Ezra Taft Benson|Phil Gordon|Neil LaBute|Richard Dutcher|Irwin Winkler|Curtis Hanson|Michael Mann|Marshall Herskovitz|Steven Soderbergh|Taylor Hackford|Michael Apted|Gilbert Cates|Doug Fulling|Curtis Fullmer|Sara Israelsen-Hartley|Wade Olsen|Doug Fabrizio|Tiffany Nez|Kirt Merrill|Ryan Van Dorn|Isaac Lifferth|Tom Brokaw|Randall Carlisle|Reed Cowan|Annie Cutler|Paul Dinello|Bob Evans|Sandra Hughes|Mark Koelbel|Spike Lee|Bruce Lindsay|Fields Moseley|Brian Mullahy|Dan Rather|Max Roth|Barbara Smith|Arrika Von|Robert Walz|Kate Winslet|Terry Wood|Hope Woodside
director: Directors: Andrew James (co-director), Joshua Aukai Ligairi (co-director) (as Joshua Ligairi)
title: Cleanflix
